channel.title: PSArm on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in PSArm on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: Getting Started with PSArm
item.description: In the first part of this series, you learned about PSArm – a PowerShell embedded DSL – that you can use to declaratively define your Azure infrastructure and generate an ARM template.

item.title: PSArm - PowerShell DSL For Azure Resource Manager - Introduction
item.description: Those who worked on Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates understand that complexity of writing and making sure the template works as expected becomes very complicated as the complexity of a deployment grows.
